DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith® Dissection Clinical Trial clinical trial approve US FDA study safety effectiveness Zenith® Dissection Endovascular System treatment patient aortic dissection .
DOC.criteria: Branch vessel obstruction/compromise Periaortic effusion/hematoma Resistant hypertension Persistent pain/symptoms Transaortic growth > 5 mm within 3 month Transaortic diameter > 40 mm . Age < 18 year ; Other medical condition ( e.g. , cancer , congestive heart failure ) may cause patient noncompliant protocol , confound result , associate limited life expectancy ( i.e. , less 2 year ) Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant within 24 month ; Unwilling unable comply followup schedule Inability refusal give inform consent Simultaneously participate another investigative device drug study . ( The patient must complete primary endpoint previous study least 30 day prior enrollment study . ) Additional medical restriction specify Clinical Investigation Plan , Additional anatomical restriction specify Clinical Investigation Plan .
